hours_text:
# Visit

### Admission

Admission to the museum is **always FREE.**

Programming fees vary and are listed on each [Calendar Event](/calendar).

[ ](https://www.blowingrockmuseum.org/offerings/tours)

### Hours

**HOURS**  
Tuesday-Saturday, 11am–5pm

Thursdays, 11am–7pm

Sundays 11am–4pm (May–October)

Closed Mondays

**OFFICE HOURS**  
Monday-Friday, 9am–5pm

[ ]()

### Free Museum Tours

To learn more about our guided tour options click [here](/guided-tours)[.](https://www.blowingrockmuseum.org/offerings/tours)

To learn mre about our Docent led tours click [here](https://www.blowingrockmuseum.org/docents).

## Location

159 Ginny Stevens Lane _(formerly Chestnut Street)_

_Mailing address: PO Box 828_

Blowing Rock, NC 28605

## Parking

Free parking is available in the deck adjacent to the Museum

## Tips for Visiting

### In the Galleries

  * The gallery attendants are here both to protect the artworks and provide you with assistance.

  * Help us protect our collection by staying 12 inches away from artwork and not touching artworks, or cases.

  * We encourage you to sketch in the galleries with only pencils and avoid obstructing pathways for other visitors. We ask that parents or caregivers carry kids’ pencils or sketchbooks while walking through the galleries.

  * Please turn your cell phones to silent mode while in the galleries to help ensure an enjoyable museum experience for all.

  * Unscheduled lecturing to groups is not permitted. Contact us to schedule at [...
admission_text:
# Membership

### Join or Renew your Membership Today

[ Join or Renew Now ](https://www.blowingrockmuseum.org/membership#join)

What an exciting time to be a BRAHM member! By joining now, you will help ensure the success of this cultural resource that offers education and enrichment for our region. 

As a member, you will be supporting the Museum and enjoying some of these year-round benefits*:

  * 10% off in the Museum Gift Shop

  * Exclusive exhibition previews and free curatorial tours

  * Discounts on workshops and classes

  * Reduced and/or free admission to Museum-sponsored programs

 _*Memberships are good for one year from payment date for new memberships, or one year from current member date for renewals._

Please consider a recurring membership by monthly or quarterly payments. You won't have to worry about lapsed membership and you'll save the Museum time and expense by avoiding having to send renewal reminders. 

**Do you want to share the museum with others?**

A BRAHM Membership makes an excellent gift that keeps giving throughout the year.

#### Learn More

  * [**Basic Membership Levels**](https://www.blowingrockmuseum.org/membership#basic)

  * [**Sustainer Membership Levels**](https://www.blowingrockmuseum.org/membership#sustainer)

  * [**Leadership Giving Levels**](https://blowingrockmuseum.org/membership#societies)

  * [**Membership Benefits**](https://blowingrockmuseum.org/membership#benefits)

#### Upcoming Annual Member Meeting
